pageContext.claim: “Kamala Harris encouraged Americans to donate to the so-called Minnesota Freedom Fund -- do you know that is? -- which bailed out the rioters, looters, assaulters, and anarchists from jail. And Biden's staff did the same thing; they donated a lot of their money to get them out of jail so that everyone was right back on the streets.”
pageContext.analysis: We looked into this and it turned out The Minnesota Freedom Fund was only a bit player in the release of people charged during the protests. The vast majority of people — 92 percent — had to pay no bail. So Trump is wrong to suggest that the donations led to the release of many protesters or rioters.
